pr_title: forget password flow change and bug fixes for Android

timeline.message:
1.Flow change in Forget and then change password scenario(Force logout after changing password)
2.Splash screen getting stuck issue fixes
3.Issue in charts for month type not displaying fixes
4.Issue in handling status for studies fixes
5.Removed google.com link from App site, terms & conditions
6.Github -- simplifing filter option for studylist fixes
7.Github -- removing overlay in thumbnails for studylist fixes

timeline.bodyText: this doesn't look like a well defined failure case, what is the status code in this case? is it possible to check for that instead?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: For this service(Study_info), we need to perform this block for all the error status code so we'll have to check in this way.
replies.author: naveenr-btc

timeline.bodyText: nit: you don't need case insensitive comparison to check for empty string. A better way to check is probably to use isBlank method. See https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/12/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/String.html#isBlank()
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: or use str.length()==0 if you do not want to exclude strings containing multiple whitespaces.
replies.author: zohrehj
